mapper.sql: select A.bill_id , A.bill_no , A.bill_name -- 안건 이름 , A.ppsr_id , A.ppsr_nm -- 제안자 이름 , A.member_nm , A.bill_name_kg , A.bill_name_ru , A.bill_kind , A.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb , A.na_term_cd , A.ppsl_dt , A.gvrn_trsf_dt , A.prmg_dt , A.prmg_no , A.ppsl_knd_cd , A.ppsl_knd_nm , A.rcp_dt , A.reg_dt , A.current_step_id , A.stat_nm , A.stat_cd , A.etc from ( select em.bill_id , em.bill_name_kg , em.bill_name_ru , fngetlangnm(em.bill_name_kg, em.bill_name_ru, em.bill_name_kg, #{lang}) as bill_name , em.bill_no , em.bill_kind , em.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb , em.na_term_cd , em.ppsr_id , em.ppsl_knd_cd , fngetcodenm('1005', em.ppsl_knd_cd, #{lang}) as ppsl_knd_nm , fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg, vum.member_nm_ru, vum.member_nm_kg, #{lang}) as ppsr_nm , fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg, vum.member_nm_ru, vum.member_nm_kg, #{lang}) as member_nm , em.etc_kg , em.etc_ru , fngetlangnm(em.etc_kg, em.etc_ru, em.etc_kg, #{lang}) as etc , em.ppsl_dt , em.gvrn_trsf_dt , em.prmg_dt , em.prmg_no , em.rcp_dt , em.reg_dt , ebi.current_step_id , ebs.stat_cd , fngetcodenm('1010', ebs.stat_cd, #{lang}) as stat_nm from ebs_master em left join view_user_member vum on (em.ppsr_id = vum.user_id) left join ebs_bp_instance ebi on em.bill_id = ebi.bill_id left join ebs_bp_step ebs on ebi.bp_df_id = ebs.bp_df_id and ebi.current_step_id = ebs.step_id ) A
mapper.select: /* 안건 관리 상세 화면 */ /* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billMng.repository.BillMngMapper.selectOneBill */ SELECT em.bill_id -- 안건 ID , em.bill_no -- 안건 번호 , em.bill_kind -- 의안 종류 (법률안/예산안 등) , em.na_term_cd -- 대수 코드 , em.bill_name_kg -- 의안명 - kg , em.bill_name_ru -- 의안명 - ru , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.bill_name_kg,em.bill_name_ru,em.bill_name_kg,#{lang}) as bill_name -- 안건 이름 , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg,vum.member_nm_ru,vum.member_nm_kg,#{lang}) as ppsr_nm -- 제안자 이름 , em.ppsl_knd_cd -- 제안자 종류 (정부/의원) , kgst.fngetcodenm('1005',em.ppsl_knd_cd,#{lang}) as ppsl_knd_nm , em.ppsr_id -- 발의자 아이디 , em.ppsl_dt -- 제안일 , em.gvrn_trsf_dt -- 정부 이송일 , em.prmg_dt -- 공포일자 , em.prmg_no -- 공포 번호 , em.reg_id -- 등록자 아이디 , em.reg_dt -- 등록 일자 , em.rcp_dt -- 안건접수일자 , kgst.fngetlangnm(em.etc_kg,em.etc_ru,em.etc_kg,#{lang}) as etc -- 비고 , em.scl_dsc_rcp_nmb , ebi.current_step_id , ebs.stat_cd FROM ebs_master em join view_user_member vum on (em.ppsr_id = vum.user_id) left outer join ebs_bp_instance ebi on (em.bill_id = ebi.bill_id) left outer join ebs_bp_step ebs on (ebi.bp_df_id = ebs.bp_df_id and ebi.current_step_id = ebs.step_id) where em.bill_id = #{billId}

/* 안건 관리 상세 화면 */ /* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billMng.repository.BillMngMapper.selectOneBillByGd */ select pl.bill_id , kgst.fngetlangnm(pl.bill_name_kg,pl.bill_name_ru,pl.bill_name_kg,#{lang}) as bill_name -- 안건 이름 , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg,vum.member_nm_ru,vum.member_nm_kg,#{lang}) as ppsr_nm -- 제안자 이름 , kgst.fngetlangnm(pl.etc_kg,pl.etc_ru,pl.etc_kg,#{lang}) as etc -- etc , pl.bill_name_kg , pl.bill_name_ru , pl.bill_no , pl.bill_kind , pl.na_term_cd , pl.ppsr_id , vum.member_nm_kg , vum.member_nm_ru , pl.ppsl_dt , pl.current_step_id , pl.step_id , pl.task_id , pl.task_status , kgst.fngetcodenm('1010',pl.stat_cd,#{lang}) as stat_nm , pl.assigned_to , pl.trgt_user_id , pl.rcp_dt from kgst.view_bill_process_list pl join kgst.view_user_member vum on (pl.ppsr_id = vum.user_id) where 1=1 and pl.bill_id = #{billId} and pl.assigned_to = #{assignedTo} and pl.task_id = #{taskId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billMng.repository.BillMngMapper.selectOnelegalReview */ select emd.seq , emd.bill_id , emd.cls_cd , emd.rmrk_kg , emd.rmrk_ru , emd.mtn_dt , emd.prsd_rjct_dt , emd.lgl_rvw_rslt_code , emd.lgl_act_rslt_code , emd.rslt_dt , emd.rslt_code , emd.dept_cd , emd.reg_id , emd.reg_dt from kgst.ebs_master_detail emd where emd.seq = #{seq}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billMng.repository.BillMngMapper.selectListCmtMeetingList */ select em.mtng_id , em.mtng_type_cd , em.dept_cd , em.dept_nm , em.open_dtm , em.close_dtm , em.due_dtm , em.mtng_plc , em.stat_cd , kgst.fngetcodenm('1007',em.stat_cd,#{lang}) as stat_nm , ema.bill_id , ema.rslt_cd from ebs_mtng em join ebs_mtng_agenda ema on (em.mtng_id = ema.mtng_id) where ema.bill_id = #{billId} and em.dept_cd = #{deptCd} order by em.open_dtm

/* 발의자 명단 조회 */ SELECT row_number() over(order by ep.ord asc) as num , cm.member_nm as memberNm , ep.proposer_id as proposerId , cm.profile_img_path as profileImgPath FROM ebs_proposer ep left outer join com_member cm on cm.member_id = ep.proposer_id WHERE 1=1 AND ep.bill_id = #{billId} AND (ep.sign_dt IS NOT NULL AND ep.sign_cnc_dt IS NULL)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kgst.ebs_proposer ( bill_id, proposer_id, ord, poly_cd, poly_nm, sign_dt, reg_id, reg_dt ) VALUES ( #{billId}, #{proposerId}, #{ord}, #{polyCd}, #{polyNm}, CASE WHEN #{agreeYn} = 'Y' THEN now() ELSE NULL END, #{regId}, now() )
mapper.select:
/* 발의자 선택 팝업용 의원 명단 조회 */ SELECT row_number() over(order by cm.poly_nm, cm.member_nm) as num , cm.cmit_cd , CASE WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then cd.dept_nm1 WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_2' then cd.dept_nm2 ELSE cd.dept_nm3 END AS cmitNm , cm.profile_img_path , cm.member_id AS proposerId , cm.member_nm AS proposerNm , cm.poly_cd , cm.poly_nm FROM kgst.com_member cm LEFT OUTER JOIN kgst.com_dept cd ON (cm.cmit_cd = cd.dept_cd and cd.upr_dept_cd = 'CMT') WHERE 1=1
AND em.na_term_cd = #{naTermCd}

/* 안건관리 상세 화면에서 소관위 / 관련위 보여줄때 사용.*/
SELECT row_number() over(order by ep.ord asc) as num , ep.proc_kind_cd , ep.proc_dept_id , CASE WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_1' then cd.dept_nm1 WHEN #{lang} = 'lng_type_2' then cd.dept_nm2 ELSE cd.dept_nm3 END AS procDeptNm FROM ebs_process ep LEFT JOIN com_dept cd ON (ep.proc_dept_id = cd.dept_cd) WHERE 1=1 AND (ep.proc_kind_cd = 'PC500' OR ep.proc_kind_cd = 'PC600') AND ep.use_yn='Y' AND ep.bill_id = #{billId}

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billMng.repository.BillMngMapper.selectFileList */
SELECT ef.seq , ef.bill_id , ef.file_kind_cd , ef.cls_cd , ef.org_file_id , ef.org_file_nm , ef.pdf_file_id , ef.pdf_file_nm , ef.rmk , ef.opb_yn , ef.delete_yn , ef.file_size , ef.reg_id , ef.reg_dt , ef.mod_id , ef.mod_dt , ef.detail_seq , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg, vum.member_nm_ru, vum.member_nm_kg, #{lang}) as ppsr_nm -- 제안자 이름 FROM kgst.ebs_file ef left join view_user_member vum on vum.user_id = ef.reg_id WHERE ef.delete_yn = 'N' and ef.bill_id = #{billId} order by ef.file_kind_cd, ef.reg_dt

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billMng.repository.BillMngMapper.selectProposerByBillId */ select row_number() over(order by ep.ord asc) as num , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.member_nm_kg, vum.member_nm_ru, vum.member_nm_kg, #{lang}) as proposerNm -- 제안자 이름 , kgst.fngetlangnm(vum.cmit_nm_kg, vum.cmit_nm_ru, vum.cmit_nm_ko, #{lang}) as cmitNm -- 위원회 이름 , vum.poly_nm -- 정당 이름 from kgst.ebs_proposer ep join kgst.view_user_member vum on vum.member_id = ep.proposer_id where 1=1 and ep.bill_id = #{billId} and (ep.sign_dt is not null and sign_cnc_dt is null)

/* QueryID : kr.co.bestiansoft.ebillservicekg.bill.review.billMng.repository.BillMngMapper.selectEbsMasterCmtList */ select kgst.fngetlangnm(cd.dept_nm1 , cd.dept_nm2, cd.dept_nm3, #{lang}) as cmtNm -- 위원회이름 , emc.cmt_cd , emc.cmt_se_cd from kgst.ebs_master_cmt emc join kgst.com_dept cd on cd.dept_cd = emc.cmt_cd where 1=1 and emc.bill_id = #{billId}
